meanings.definition: Not relating to or involving photography.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various nonphotographic artworks.
meanings.sent2: Her nonphotographic skills in painting were exceptional.
meanings.sent3: The nonphotographic art class used clay instead of cameras.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a nonphotographic canvas, filled with imagination.
meanings.sent5: The nonphotographic world of sculpture opened up new possibilities.

meanings.sent1: The broken camera was now nonphotographic.
meanings.sent2: The old film was nonphotographic and couldn't capture images.
meanings.sent3: The nonphotographic camera only produced blurry pictures.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a nonphotographic film, fading with time.
meanings.sent5: The nonphotographic lens distorted reality in a unique way.
